original_title: 家、行ってもイイでしょ！？仕事疲れのおじさんをスタイル抜群のイマドキ女子が犯してアゲル 結城りの 柚希あい
overview: Rino Yuki & Ai Yuuki's preeminent style of today's girls (both surnames are 'Yuki') co-starring as a slut! With full ad-libbing without any acting or scripts, we will heal the mind and heart of a middle-aged office worker who is exhausted from work and stress! Sometimes it's hard and sometimes it's gentle. Throw away your weird pride and do everything in your power to be spoiled by a young Japanese boy!
title: I Can Go Home With You Right? Modern Stylish Girl Anally Ravaged By Old Guy Tired After Work
